description: Try our easy to follow Prawn & Sun Dried Tomato Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Seafood pasta,Pescatarian,Quick & easy dinner,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Prawn,Tomato,Low sugar,Sesame free
name: Prawn & Sun Dried Tomato Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook spaghetti in a large saucepan of boiling salted water until just tender. Drain and keep warm.
While pasta is cooking, heat a frying pan over medium heat. Add oil and garlic and cook until just golden. Add prawns and toss over heat until they change colour.
Add sundried tomatoes, pine nuts, capers and dill. Toss through pasta until well combined. Divide among serving plates and drizzle with a little oil.
